#summary Limits spawn interval.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

Prevents any spawners from spawning aliens faster than this value. `0.5` would mean no more than 2 aliens per second, `1.0` is a maximum of 1 alien per second... etc.

|| *Revision Added* || *Default* || *[CvarFlags Flags]* || *[ParamType Parameter Type]* ||
|| r150 || `0` || [FCVAR_NONE] || [Float] ||
